00056 class Connection : public lunchbox::Referenced, public boost::noncopyable
00057 {
00058 public:
00059     enum State 
00060     {
00061         STATE_CLOSED,     
00062         STATE_CONNECTING, 
00063         STATE_CONNECTED,  
00064         STATE_LISTENING,  
00065         STATE_CLOSING     
00066     };
00067 
00078     CO_API static ConnectionPtr create( ConnectionDescriptionPtr desc );
00079 
00083     CO_API State getState() const;
00084 
00086     bool isClosed() const { return getState() == STATE_CLOSED; }
00087 
00089     bool isClosing() const { return getState() == STATE_CLOSING; }
00090 
00092     bool isConnected() const { return getState() == STATE_CONNECTED; }
00093 
00095     bool isListening() const { return getState() == STATE_LISTENING; }
